long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reduces clutter on Twitter.com, making it easier to read.

Inline media is moved to the side.

Always hides this stuff:
* Moments tab
* Who to Follow
* While You Were Away
* You Might Like
* Trends

Optionally hides this stuff in the Notifications page:
* So-and-so followed you
* So-and-so liked your tweet
* So-and-so retweeted you

This extension is open source. Fork it at https://github.com/adurdin/noclutter
